# preferredOutputSegmentInterval

**Instance Property**

The interval of output segments that you prefer.

## Declaration

```swift
var preferredOutputSegmentInterval: CMTime { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreMedia/CMTime/invalid], which indicates that the asset writer chooses an appropriate default value. You may also set a positive numeric or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreMedia/CMTime/indefinite] time. When the value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreMedia/CMTime/indefinite], each call you make to [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetWriter/flushSegment()] outputs a segment data.

You can’t change this value after writing starts.

## Configuring segment writing

- **delegate**: A delegate object that responds to asset-writing events.
- **AVAssetWriterDelegate**: A delegate protocol that defines the methods to implement to respond to asset-writing events.
- **initialSegmentStartTime**: The start time of the initial segment.
- **outputFileTypeProfile**: A profile for the output file type.
- **flushSegment()**: Closes the current segment and outputs it to a delegate method.
